'''Ishine Script Deciphering''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] that takes place in [[Tsurumi Island]], [[Inazuma]] that involves solving [[Ishine Script]] to obtain [[Stone Slate]]s. It requires unlocking the [[World Quest]] ''[[Octave of the Maushiro]]''.

<noinclude>
